Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In vitro - differentiated DMPK [ - / - ] myotubes exhibit a higher resting [ Ca2 + ] i than do wild - type myotubes because of an altered open probability of voltage - dependent l - type Ca2 + and Na + channels .

Let's think step by step.

1. DMPK (Myotubes derived from Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy Patient's Cells)
2. Wild-type myotubes (Normal myotubes)

The paragraph is discussing the differences in calcium ion (Ca2+) levels in differentiated myotubes derived from Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy patients (DMPK myotubes) compared to normal myotubes (wild-type myotubes). Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy is a genetic disorder that affects muscle function and progressively weakens muscles. Therefore, Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy is the disease entity mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
